item.description:
Hello Folks,

I know this is last minute, but some of us would like to meet for a Hike at Mt. Tom in Holyoke, Ma. on
this Sunday May 30th at 2pm.

Here are the details:

We will meet in the parking lot of the Log Cabin at 2pm which is adjacent to Mt Tom entrance.
From there we will drive over to Mt. Tom and park our cars.

Plan on a moderate hike with spectacular views.

Don't forget the following:
1. Water
2. Sun Glasses
3. Bug Repellent

Questions? Please feel free to email me. I will also provide my phone number to those who
RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at the Log Cabin Entrance
item.name: Hiking at Mount Tom in Holyoke, MA
